thread.title: Chelsea news: Chelsea to hijack rival club's £21m bid for La Liga star | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea news: Chelsea to hijack rival club's £21m bid for La Liga star | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea news: Chelsea to hijack rival club's £21m bid for La Liga star | Metro News
text:
Chelsea to muscle in on AC Milan’s £21m move for Mateo Musacchio gossip Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 9:25 pm Mateo Musacchio is wanted by Chelsea. (Getty Images) 
Chelsea are looking to beat AC Milan to the £21 million signing of Villarreal centre-back Mateo Musacchio, according to reports. 
The Daily Mirror claims that the Premier League leaders want to submit their own offer for the 26-year-old, despite the Argentine being close to agreeing a move to the Serie A side. 
The report claims that Musacchio, who has been capped four times by Argentina, has a release clause in his contract. 
Antonio Conte is believed to be in the market for a new central defender this summer, with Leonardo Bonucci heavily linked with a move to Stamford Bridge. Musacchio has been a key figure in Villarreal’s defence this season. (Getty Images) 
Musacchio, meanwhile, has been a key figure in a Villarreal defence which boasts the best record in La Liga this season. 
Fran Escriba’s side have conceded just 18 goals in La Liga this season – two fewer than Barcelona and four less than Real Madrid.
